data.name: fault Series ORIGINAL SOUNDTRACK vol 1
data.detailed_description:
这是一部原声专辑，收录了来自fault - milestone one和fault - milestone two side:above中的精选音乐。

警示：版权事宜所限，此专辑内并未包含全部在 fault milestone one与fault milestone two side:above中所使用的乐曲。该产品中所收录的具体曲目请参照曲目单介绍。请注意该专辑中的全部曲目均以OGG格式存储。

00 - 残響
01 - The Regal Ninth
02 - Death of Dignity
03 - Death of Dignity short ver
04 - The Divide
05 - Adorathrill
06 - In the Light of Hope
07 - Survivors
08 - Leaving the Known Lands
09 - Port Sasary
10 - Everyday Photons
11 - Ode
12 - Neo Sasary
13 - Surface Tension
14 - Method, Girls
15 - Under Your Skin
16 - The Guise
17 - The Show Must Go On
18 - Rune
19 - Sol
20 - Ode Piano Version
21 - Melano (Unused Track)
22 - Prelude
23 - Prelude - music box
24 - Prelude - celesta (Original 残響)
25 - Modus Operandi - music box New
26 - Modus Operandi - celesta
27 - Modus Operandi - Instrumental
28 - In the Light of Hope - spineless ver
